title: Coffin Collector
description: After his fianc√©e is slain by a murderous cult, Delta Force Operator Mark Talon dedicates himself to a new mission - hunting down twisted occultists around the globe and stopping them before they can unleash the forces of darkness upon an unsuspecting world.In COFFIN COLLECTOR , Talon heads to Italy to face a chilling coffin maker who has acquired the casket of a famed practitioner of the dark arts.COFFIN COLLECTOR is a supernatural short story and makes for a quick, self-contained read featuring a chilling new villain. Mark Talon is featured in the novels Damnation Code, Apocalypse Soldier, Spirit Breaker and Soul Jacker and the novella Ice Shadows.
author: William Massa
